channel.title: All Bout Pk Source Released Finally!What everyone's been waiting for!
channel.description:
This is the All Bout Pk Source V1!!!
Credits:
Total: 100%
God of Worlds - For their original source. 20% Hailmerry7(ME) - For editing the server. 70% Harlan(Best Friend) - For giving me ideas and helping me out. 20% Staff - For helping me keep everything under control and testing my new stuff added in the server. 10%
Thanks For pushing me around to put more and more stuff in the server!!!
Much appreciated!
Hailmerry7 Owner and Coder of the All Bout Pk Server
Home[/size] [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Home.jpg[/img]
Vengeance [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Vengeance.jpg[/img]
Skills Area [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Skills.jpg[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Shops.jpg[/img]
Train 1: Jads do not Attack Back unless using DDS Special or Magic(also when your right next to it and you attack it). [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Train1.jpg[/img]
Train 2 [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Train2.jpg[/img]
Gods Minigame [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Godsminigame.jpg[/img]
SkillCapes Work!! [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Skillcapes.jpg[/img]
Pk Area!! [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/Pk.jpg[/img]
Pk Tournament Area! Host Pk Tournaments Here!! [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/PkTournamentArea.jpg[/img]
The Underground Pk Box: The Rope Goes up to the Upper Pk Box! [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/PkBox.jpg[/img]
Upper Pk Box: The Rope from the Underground Pk Box comes up to this Area! [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/PkBoxAddOn.jpg[/img]
StaffZone 1(Old StaffZone): Staffzone that was there when I got it. Click on the Crate to Tele to the New StaffZone. [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/OriginalStaffzone.jpg[/img]
StaffZone 2(New StaffZone made by Hailmerry7): The rope goes tot the Old Staffzone. [IMG]http://i304.photobucket.com/albums/nn191/hailmerry7/MyStaffzone.jpg[/img]
Download Link For All Bout Pk Source V1: http://www.mediafire.com/file/tm0gctb2cjm/god-of-worlds.rar
Trust Me It's Worth It!

item.title: All Bout Pk Source Released Finally!What everyone's been waiting for!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Looks decent, but it’s lacking a few features. I know “but it’s a pking server”. That doesn’t mean you can’t add a few unique things to it. If you’re really trying to emphasize the “pking” part of the server, make something special about pking points, or amount of kills.

Example:
If you get 500 pk points, you can buy and wield special weapons and armor.

I’m not a fan of pushing specific things out in my server like pking, but if i were to make it just a pking source, i would add some original things to it to stick out more than the other normal servers.

Congratulations on the release though, good luck in future coding.

Read full topic
